scalikejdbc.SQL.apply[Nothing]("SELECT full_name, overall_score, overall_rank FROM all_time INNER JOIN knolder ON all_time.knolder_id = knolder.id ORDER BY overall_score ASC").map[com.knoldus.leader_board.GetAuthorScore](((rs: scalikejdbc.WrappedResultSet) => com.knoldus.leader_board.GetAuthorScore.apply(rs.string("full_name"), rs.int("overall_score"), rs.int("overall_rank")))).list()
